sentences.sContent: He didn’t want to embarrass her by asking questions.

synos.tran: 使局促不安；使困窘；阻碍

remMethod.val: em(进入)+barrass(阻碍)→想进入却受到阻碍→使困窘

words.tran: 使人尴尬的；令人为难的
窘迫，难堪；使人为难的人或事物；拮据
使...困窘；使...局促不安（embarrass的过去分词形式）

trans.tranCn: 使困窘， 使局促不安
trans.tranOther: to make someone feel ashamed, nervous, or uncomfortable, especially in front of other people
